articles.title: Problems with alcohol? 29 gene variants may explain why - Science Daily
articles.description: A genome-wide analysis of more than 435,000 people has identified 29 genetic variants linked to problematic drinking, researchers report.
articles.content: A genome-wide analysis of more than 435,000 people has identified 29 genetic variants linked to problematic drinking, researchers at Yale University School of Medicine and colleagues report May 25 in… [+1890 chars]
